JUST A HEADS UP FOR PEOPLE DOWNLOADING THIS TORRENT

WARNING:  THIS TOTAL RECALL MOVIE AND THE AMAZING SPIDER-MAN MOVIE ARE INFECTED WITH CINIVIA AND WILL NOT PLAY ON PS3 OR ANY BLURAY PLAYERS THAT HAVE CINIVIA IN THEIR FIRMWARE IF THE AUDIO IS CONVERTED TO AC3 OR AAC FORMAT FROM DTS. 

IF YOU HAVE TO CONVERT THE AUDIO FROM DTS TO AC3 AND VIDEO FROM MKV TO MP4 TO PLAY ON PS3 IT SUCKS BECAUSE THE PS3 WON'T PLAY IT. :( 

HOWEVER IF YOU HAVE A BLURAY PLAYER THAT IS CINIVIA FREE LIKE I DO THEN THIS MKV VIDEO WILL PLAY FINE.

English subtitles: http://www.engsub.net/163361/

Enjoy!
